dct_description_sm: Drawn by J. Wyld ; Hewitt, Sc. Grafton Str. East, Totten m. Ct. Rd.
Relief shown pictorially and by shading.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "British statute miles".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation (including deserts), mines (copper), pyramids, islands surrounding continent.
Pictorial vignette: Sacrificing at the springs of the Nile.
